participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and quirky, Alex enjoys the thrill of competition and is always up for a challenge.
participant_1.background: I'm a klutz, but I'm still proud of my comic book collection. I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition. I am a bit of an oddball, but I try to get along with my family. I enjoy hiking. My favorite outfit is thigh high leather boots and a skirt.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and energetic, Jordan is passionate about filmmaking and loves to express himself through art and fitness.
participant_2.background: I love making short films with my camcorder. I once dressed up as a superhero and told the police officer that I was on my way to save the world. I like to stay active and go to the gym 3-4 times a week. I graduated high school. My favorite type of music is metal.

content.text: Hi, I'm looking for a new friend.
Hi, I'm new in town and I'm also looking for a friend.
Cool, what are some of your hobbies?
I love to make short films.
That's cool, I like to write scripts.
That's awesome, I've always wanted to try writing a script.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun.
I might just do that.
What else do you like to do?
I like to go to the gym and stay active.
Me too, I go to the gym 3-4 times a week.
That's awesome! What's your favorite type of music?
I love metal music.
That's cool, I like some metal music too.
What are some of your favorite bands?
I like Slipknot, Metallica, and System of a Down.
I like Slipknot too! They're one of my favorite bands.
Cool, I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too, I think we're going to get along great.
I think so too.
